body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     After Dark in the Park Video Archive - 2016     2014                After Dark in the Park Video Archives - 2014      Click on the links below for a description and video of each 2014 program      November 2014November 4, 2014 - How Hawai‘i Became a State     October 2014October 21, 2014 - Thomas Jefferson to Johnson Space Center: Fossil History in America      September 2014September 23, 2014 - Hawai‘i's BIG Earthquakes     July 2014 July 29, 2014 - The Untold Story: Internment of Japanese Americans in Hawai‘iJuly 15, 2014 - Ladies of Hālau Hula Kamaolikolehua      June 2014 June 24, 2014 - Carl Ray Villaverde: Hawaiian Magic - Live Concert  June 10, 2014 - Ka po‘e no‘ono‘o: Early Native Hawaiian Scholars Who Captured Pre-contact Hawai‘i Nei      May 2014 May 20, 2014 - The Navigators - Pathfinders of the Pacific: Special Showing with Filmmaker Sam Low May 13, 2014 - Runt of the Litter: The 1924 Explosive Eruption of Kīlauea May 6, 2014 - Hawai‘i Volcanoes National Park's First Artist in Residence: Rick Makanaaloha Kia‘imeaokekanaka San Nicolas     April 2014 April 22, 2014 - Earthquake Storms: The Past and Present of the San Andreas Fault April 8, 2014 - Adventures in the Philippines      March 2014 March 25, 2014 - Mauna Loa: Eruptive History and Current Status of Earth's Largest Active Volcano March 4, 2014 - From Ka‘ū to Kona: Stories of Lava Flows and Volcanic Landscapes     February 2014 February 11, 2014 - Up in Arms!
